payload.name: Sarah Chen
payload.notes: Met at v0 hackathon. Interested in BD automation tools.

payload.name: James Miller
payload.notes: DevRel, building agent tools. Follow up about partnership.

payload.name: Alex Thompson
payload.notes: Early stage, might be relevant in 6 months.

payload.subject: Great chatting at the hackathon
payload.body:
Hi John,

Great meeting you at the v0 hackathon today. I enjoyed our conversation about [topic].

Would love to continue the discussion. Are you free for a quick call next week?

Best,
Robert

payload.notes: They want to see the BD automation in action

curl_examples.send_email: curl -X POST "YOUR_WEBHOOK_URL" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"action":"send_email","to_name":"John","subject":"Following up","body":"Great meeting you..."}'
